Well I hate to push something but I just released Mission Controller .60. And it has a new Asteroid Redirect mission built into the contract system. And the base pay for science to finish the mission is 500... It all matters what company offers the Contract though. And the Base Pay out is 700,000 Credits, or Kerb Credits or whatever you want to call the money system. Again that fluctuates with What company is giving you the contract.

Its not easy though because the random system can pick any asteroid for you.. If you get lucky you might get a small one... But you can also get Contracted for the big one.. The hardest part is getting the thing back into orbit.. The orbits are also random and can be from just outside Mun orbit or all the way out past Minmus..

Not including all the other missions you can get..
